WorkItem.ClosedComment: 3 months and 11 versions old, if this is still an issue please resubmit
WorkItem.Description:
When I load a character using the Character Profiler data, it picks up all the bank items except the off-hand items.  The data is in the file.  It picks up the off-hand being worn.  It is somehow just missing the ones in the bank.
 
v2.2.2 Mage
 
P.S.  Love Rawr!  Love the Character Profiler option.  I have one request for using the Character Profiler data.  Can there be an option to green diamond the profiled items rather than blue diamond red dot.  I'm a bit of a pack rat and it takes some time to switch them all to green.  ;)
WorkItem.Summary: Off-hand items in bags and Character Profiler

Comments.Message: The title should have said bank instead of bags but it made me wonder.  I tried moving the off-hand items from the bank to the character's bags.  They still were not found, but I wanted to check in case there was a difference between bank and carried bags.
